name: Marin County Suicide Prevention Hotline
description: Family Service Agency of Marin operates a 24/7 suicide prevention hotline and grief counseling line for Marin County residents in crisis.
fullDescription: Family Service Agency of Marin operates a 24/7 suicide prevention hotline and grief counseling line for Marin County residents in crisis.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 suicide prevention hotline
- 24/7 grief counseling line
- Crisis intervention
- Referrals to local services
- Confidential support
howToGetIt: Call 415-499-1100 for suicide crisis support. Call 415-499-1195 for grief counseling. Both lines available 24/7.
